General.Name: Isu Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: ISU Chemical Co., Ltd. produces and sells petrochemicals and fine chemicals primarily in South Korea. Its products include linear alkyl benzene, NP, branched alkyl benzene, special functional solution, TAB, LAS, parasol, TDM, NaSH, and IPA products. ISU Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
